#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <ctype.h>

int main() {
    // Step 1: Read inputs and process first step.

    int pya;
    scanf("%d", &pya);
    // consume newline
    getchar();

    // Read N lines into arre
    char **arre = malloc(pya * sizeof(char *));
    for (int i = 0; i < pya; i++) {
        char buffer[1000];
        fgets(buffer, sizeof(buffer), stdin);
        buffer[strcspn(buffer, "\n")] = 0; // remove newline
        // convert to lowercase
        char *lower = strdup(buffer);
        for (int j = 0; lower[j]; j++) {
            lower[j] = tolower(lower[j]);
        }
        arre[i] = lower;
    }

    // Read oString
    char oString[10000];
    fgets(oString, sizeof(oString), stdin);
    oString[strcspn(oString, "\n")] = 0;

    // Read letter1
    char letter1_line[100];
    fgets(letter1_line, sizeof(letter1_line), stdin);
    letter1_line[0] = tolower(letter1_line[0]);
    char letter1 = letter1_line[0];
    char letter2 = (letter1 != 'a') ? 'a' : 'b';

    // Process first step: find setcito and modify oString
    size_t len = strlen(oString);
    char *lowString = malloc(len + 1);
    strcpy(lowString, oString);
    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
        lowString[i] = tolower(lowString[i]);
    }

    char *setcito = calloc(len, sizeof(char));

    for (int i = 0; i < pya; i++) {
        const char *x = arre[i];
        int x_len = strlen(x);
        if (x_len == 0) continue;
        int pos = 0;
        while (pos <= len - x_len) {
            int found = 1;
            for (int k = 0; k < x_len; k++) {
                if (lowString[pos + k] != x[k]) {
                    found = 0;
                    break;
                }
            }
            if (found) {
                for (int j = pos; j < pos + x_len; j++) {
                    setcito[j] = 1;
                }
                pos += 1; // move to next possible position for overlapping
            } else {
                pos += 1;
            }
        }
    }

    // Create result_str
    char *result_str = strdup(oString);
    for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
        if (setcito[i]) {
            char current_char = lowString[i];
            char replacement_letter;
            if (current_char != letter1) {
                replacement_letter = letter1;
            } else {
                replacement_letter = letter2;
            }
            // adjust case
            char original_char = oString[i];
            if (islower(original_char)) {
                result_str[i] = replacement_letter;
            } else {
                result_str[i] = toupper(replacement_letter);
            }
        }
    }

    free(setcito);
    free(lowString);
    for (int i = 0; i < pya; i++) {
        free(arre[i]);
    }
    free(arre);

    // Step 2: Process second step
    int counts[256] = {0};
    for (int i = 0; result_str[i]; i++) {
        counts[(unsigned char)result_str[i]]++;
    }

    int unique_count = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
        if (counts[i] > 0) unique_count++;
    }

    char *second_result;
    if (unique_count != 2) {
        second_result = "No";
    } else {
        int valid = 1;
        for (int i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
            if (counts[i] != 0 && counts[i] != 2) {
                valid = 0;
                break;
            }
        }
        second_result = valid ? "Yes" : "No";
    }

    free(result_str);

    // Step 3: Process third step
    const char *s = second_result;
    char third_result[100];
    int res_len = 0;

    for (int i = 0; s[i]; i++) {
        char current_char = s[i];
        if (i == 0) {
            if (strchr(",.!? ", current_char) != NULL) {
                continue;
            } else {
                third_result[res_len++] = current_char;
            }
        } else {
            if (current_char == ' ') {
                if (res_len == 0 || third_result[res_len - 1] != ' ') {
                    third_result[res_len++] = current_char;
                }
            } else {
                if (strchr(",.!? ", current_char) != NULL) {
                    if (res_len > 0 && third_result[res_len - 1] == ' ') {
                        res_len--;
                    }
                    third_result[res_len++] = current_char;
                    // append empty string (nothing)
                } else {
                    third_result[res_len++] = current_char;
                }
            }
        }
    }
    third_result[res_len] = '\0';

    printf("%s\n", third_result);

    return 0;
}
